module.name: physical_node_requirement_to_implementing_component_allocation
module.name.french: Spécification du noeud physique pour l'implémentation du composant
module.keywords: module, connectivity, allocation, connectivity implementation, substrate, interconnect

abstract.li: Mapping between a logical connection requirement and a component that partially or completely implements that requirement.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a link in the path between the functional definition and the geometric representation of the interconnect substrate conductive patterns that is an implementation of the connectivity in the functional definition. The link represented in this part of ISO 10303 is between a node that specifies the component terminals to be connected and one of the physical items that implement the connections. It is feasible that a connection requirement may be implemented by more than one item.

inscope.li: physical node requirement to implementing component allocation;
items within the scope of application module Assembly module with packaged connector component, ISO/TS 10303-1645;
items within the scope of application module Assembly technology, ISO/TS 10303-1649;
items within the scope of application module Physical connectivity definition, ISO/TS 10303-1755.

aa.refpath: physical_node_requirement_to_implementing_component_allocation <= shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition {product_definition => component_definition => assembly_component}

physical_node_requirement_to_implementing_component_allocation <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'implementation joint'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect => component_feature_joint => assembly_joint

physical_node_requirement_to_implementing_component_allocation <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'implementation interface joint'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect => interface_mounted_join
